product description: The Kyvol S31 robot vacuum automatically empties its on-board dustbin for anyone who finds the daily emptying of the dustbin a drag.

cons: App configuration issues ,Ultra bright docking station light

product description: The Avita Admiror is a really nice laptop that is certainly worth coveting. At under $800, its price certainly does belie its features.
pros: Ultra-thin desigh,Large touchpad supports four finger gestures,Long battery life
cons: No Windows Hello facial recognition

product description: The 13.3-inch ThinkPad X13 Yoga Gen 1 is a credible alternative to Lenovo's larger and more expensive ThinkPad X1 Yoga, although its battery life could be better.
pros: Small, neat and solidly built ,ThinkPad Pen Pro included and housed on-device ,Optional mobile broadband ,Useful security options
cons: Gets expensive as you add features ,Average battery life

product description: With military-grade build quality, all-day battery life and up to a Core i7 processor, HP's Pro c640 Chromebook has plenty going for it, but the screen's lack of brightness lets it down.

While Google didn't release a high end flagship in 2020, it looks like this may have been the best strategy for customers. The Pixel 4a 5G is one of the most affordable 5G phones available today and has arguably one of the best cameras on a smartphone today.
pros: Latest Android software,Excellent camera software,Affordable price,5G cellular support,3.5mm headphone jack,Rear fingerprint sensor
cons: Limited storage options

product description: While Bose and Sony dominate the conversation for ANC cans providing outstanding music experiences, Jabra is focused on making the best headsets for business. The Evolve2 85 headset extensive Teams support, has outstanding battery life, and 10 mics for high-quality speech performance.
pros: Extensive Microsoft Teams support,Powerful active noise-cancellation,Very long battery life,Computer and smartphone apps,Swing down boom for focused speech quality,Comfortable design for all-day use
cons: Right ear cup control buttons are a bit small

product description: ZTE is known for innovation in the smartphone market with first dual rear cameras, first foldable phone, and one of the first to 5G. The front-facing camera, sensors, and handset speaker are all under the display so that users experience a front that is nearly all display.

The 6.1-inch Xperia 5 II packs an updated specification into a more easily handled chassis than the 6.5-inch Xperia 1 II. The 21:9 OLED screen may not be 4K, but you do get a 120Hz refresh rate and a lower price tag.
pros: 120Hz OLED screen ,21:9 aspect ratio ,Good cameras with nice Pro mode apps ,IP rating for dust/water resistance
cons: Some unremovable software extras ,Tall format is hard to use one-handed ,Quite expensive

product name: Apple MacBook Pro - 13.3" - M1 - 8 GB RAM - 256 GB SSD - US
product description: If you're looking for a fresh design, look elsewhere. But if you're looking for killer performance, long battery life and broad app support, you'll be hard-pressed to find fault with Apple's inaugural M1-based MacBook Pro.
pros: Fast and powerful,Long battery life,All around app support,Improve camera, despite still 720p
cons: Some iPad apps need an update,Same design will be tired for some ,Can get pricey with upgrade options,Caps out at 16GB

product description: After a month of using Google's Pixel 5, it's clear the company has found its smartphone niche.
pros: Strong battery life,Good performance ,More affordable
cons: The camera is starting to get left behind

product description: The Jomise 4k dual dash cam is an affordable dash cam that is easy to configure and fairly unobtrusive in use.
pros: Good images,Affordable
cons: Dash cam looks like generic white label camera,No user guide

product description: The Zepp Z smartwatch has all of the latest advanced health tracking functionality you expect in a smartwatch today, along with integrated GPS for outdoor activity tracking. There are no third party apps and it's more expensive than other comparable smartwatches.
pros: Comfortable, solid design,Bright OLED display,Advanced health tracking capabilities,Long battery life,Integrated GPS receiver
cons: Limited apps,No support for calls on the watch,Awkward health key

product description: The Jabra Elite 85t earbuds are the next evolution in Jabra's earbud lineup with powerful active noise-cancellation capability with a focus on high-quality calling. They aren't optimized for workouts and are best for commuters, travelers, and remote workers who find over or on the ear headphones uncomfortable.
pros: Excellent sound quality,Simple, large buttons for control,Advanced smartphone application,HearThrough mode for safety,Six mics for good quality calling,Wireless charging case
cons: Only the right earbud can be used individually,Too large for secure workout use

product description: Vacos is a well built security camera to watch over your property.
pros: Innovative magnetic connection,Well-built ergonimic design
cons: Poor app,PIR triggered by animals

product description: The smallest iPhone 12 of the lot, the Mini is just as capable and powerful as its bigger counterparts.
pros: Strong performance ,Photo quality is fantastic,OLED display,Small design

product description: The iPhone 12 Pro Max is the biggest phone Apple has ever made.
pros: Long battery life,Strong performance,The camera is very impressive
cons: Expensive, with a starting price of $1,099,5G availability isn't widespread,It's big.. like really big

product description: The Oukitel WP8 is an affordable rugged smartphone with a huge screen and great camera.

cons: poorly situated fingerprint device.

product description: Amazfit has been releasing a host of new smartwatches and the latest two provide vivid AMOLED displays, attractive designs, and affordable prices while also offering a vast amount of health tracking technology. They are both successors to previous generation models and are well worth your consideration.
The AOSO S3 robot vacuum is a fast and efficient single mode sweeper with an app that works, and is easy to connect to.
pros: Fast and powerful,Small form factor,Easy to connect to app
cons: Very loud

product description: The new M1-based MacBook Air throws down the gauntlet for rival ultraportable laptops, offering speedy performance and outstanding two-day battery life.

cons: Design is looking a bit dated ,No CPU upgrade options ,Expensive RAM and storage upgrades ,Only two Thunderbolt ports

product description: Remote workers and mobile professionals will appreciate this sturdy laptop, which comes in traditional and 2-in-1 formats. Battery life and audio are particularly strong, and mobile broadband (4G or 5G) is available if you need it.

cons: FHD screen resolution only,No discrete graphics option,'Squishy’ keyboard action,Expensive

product description: The Mate 40 Pro is well designed and built, has a great OLED screen and excellent cameras, delivers good battery life, and there are some nice features in EMUI 11. But it's hard to recommend without Google apps and services.
Apple has set the bar for smartphones heading into 2021.
pros: New design,Cameras are impressive,Performance,Battery life
cons: 5G isn't widespread enough to be truly useful,Expensive

product description: 5G is available in the US and you may think you have to pay a premium to pick up a phone to take advantage of these networks. TCL is offering a very compelling Android smartphone for just $399.99 with Sub-6 and mmWave network support on Verizon.

The Spectre x360 15's outstanding features are its 15.6-inch screen and its distinctive styling. The bundled stylus and high-quality audio subsystem are plus points too, but battery life could be better.

cons: Small, fiddly touchpad,Average battery life,No on-laptop home for the stylus

product description: Blood oxygen measurement is a popular term today with Apple's introduction of it on the Apple Watch. The affordable Amazfit Band 5 supports this sensor, heart rate, menstrual tracking, and more.
The Mako touchscreen monitor is a great portable, ultra-slim monitor that is stable on its stand, stylish to look at, and responsive.
pros: Ultra-slim design,Versatile kickstand,Excellent image quality

product description: While there is not much more than the S Pen offered in the Note 20 Ultra, the Galaxy Tab S7 Plus is the device to purchase if you want to optimize your work with the S Pen. Samsung also addressed most of the problems with the Tab S6 keyboard and this tablet is built for productivity.
pros: Fantastic display,Solid hardware,Outstanding speakers,Long battery life,Capable DeX mode
cons: Awkward fingerprint sensor location,Some developers need to improve tablet experience,Expensive keyboard accessory

product description: WinZip, arguably the best file compression utility, gets some handy new features, including sharing files into Microsoft Teams -- although that's a little more work than we'd like.
It's not cheap, but this small, ergonomic wireless mouse packs in plenty of useful functionality.
These are well-made wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and a feature-rich companion app, but some may find them a tight fit.
This well-made 6.4-inch Snapdragon 720G-based phone offers excellent value for money, if you don't need 5G.

The new entry-level iPad delivers a big performance improvement over its predecessor while maintaining good battery life. It's affordable enough for home users but powerful enough for mainstream business users.

cons: 32GB of storage on base model,720p FaceTime camera,Still uses 802.11ac wi-fi and Bluetooth 4.2,No USB-C

product description: The extensive collection of ports and connectors provided by HP's USB-C Dock G5 will be ideal for anyone wanting to connect a display or other accessories to their laptop.

At $350 to get started and then $99 a year after the first year, pHin is clearly something that's meant for someone who has a more sophisticated setup than an above-ground pool from Walmart. That's not to say it doesn't help, because it does, tremendously.

product name: HP E27d G4 Advanced Docking Monitor
product description: HP's E27d G4 is an excellent option if you need a high-quality 27-inch display for working at home or in an office. It's pricey, but the built-in docking features will be useful for laptops with limited connectivity.

product description: Samsung's Galaxy A51 performs capably, has a large screen, strong battery life and looks good. It's worth shopping around though, as there's plenty of competition.

cons: Two sensors from S61 (indoor air quality sensor & laser-assisted distance measuring tool) are dropped,Mid-range performance

product description: It's the sort of laptop that would be great to throw into a bag, and head off to an event or meeting. But in these strange times, we've got nowhere to go.
pros: Very light,Astounding battery life,ErgoLift hinge hides lower bezel,NumberPad is good in theory
cons: Display resolution is too low,16:9 aspect ratio,Power button placement

product description: Its cyclone dustbin seems to collect a lot of dust from carpets and hard floors, and its lack of roller brush means it will need less maintenance.
pros: 4000Pa spot mode suction,Fast and powerful cleaning,Easy to connect to the app
cons: Noisy,Poor mapping in app

product description: The XGIMI Mogo Pro projector is nice and compact -- but it delivers great sound and superb images.
pros: Easy to set up,Chromecast built-in,HDMI, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity
cons: No SD card,Minimal information in User Guide

product description: This year, we see TCL launch its second self-branded smartphone series, with the 20 Pro 5G appearing as the flagship. We are testing a pre-production model and are very impressed after a couple of days with the phone.
We are impressed with Lenovo's latest ultraportable ThinkPad, although the 13-inch screen won't suit every use case, and the paucity of ports and connectors may put some potential buyers off.
pros: Exceptionally lightweight ,Robust build (MIL-STD 810H),All-day battery life ,Excellent keyboard ,Good audio subsystem ,Mobile broadband option ,ThinkShutter webcam privacy cover
cons: Short on ports and connectors ,Expensive

product name: Ecovacs Deebot N8 Pro+ robot vacuum
product description: The Ecovacs Deebot N8 Pro+ is a powerful robot vacuum that will avoid your carpet when in mopping mode and increase its vacuuming suction power when it detects carpet.
pros: Auto-empty station included,Easy to connect to and configure app,Boosts suction when encountering carpet
cons: Water tank a little small,Non-reusable dust bag in auto-empty station

product name: Apple AirTag - anti-loss Bluetooth tag for cellular phone, tablet
product description: Curious what can be done when nearly one billion Apple devices work together? Apple’s AirTags show the potential.
pros: Long battery life,Replaceable battery,Find My network is expansive and free,Affordable priced
cons: No key ring loop built in,Can’t share with family members

product description: GMK's NucBox2 is a superb mini PC with a host of potential use cases at home or work.
pros: Two HDMI ports,Extra USB ports at front,Quiet fan
cons: Not as portable as NucBox,No carry case

product description: If you want a fully featured, multi-purpose robot vacuum with a good app, the 360 S10 should definitely be on your shortlist
pros: Easy to connect to app,Large dustbin and water tank,Easy-empty dustbin
cons: Unnecessary rotating light,Irritatingly cheerful voice

product description: Samsung's 6.5-inch Galaxy A52 5G offers a good set of features at an attractive price point, including a 120Hz Super-AMOLED screen, but only two of the four rear cameras really pull their weight.
pros: 120Hz Super AMOLED display ,Distinctive design ,IP67 rating for dust/water resistance ,MicroSD card slot and 3.5mm headset jack,Good primary 64MP camera with OIS
cons: Disappointing macro and depth cameras ,Digital zoom only

product description: Vankyo Leisure 530W is aimed at both the small-medium office, and the home theatre user
pros: Easy to use menu,Good screen mirroring,Compact and light
cons: Limited to under 100 inches display,Not for use in bright daylight

product description: With enough DC and AC power to work and play off the grid, the Jackery Solar Generator 1500 gives you the power you need wherever you happen to be going.

THe Dr. J AK-50 is an affordable projector for home and office that will project office documents and videos in daylight, is easy to use, and relatively portable and would suit home theatre and office applications.
pros: Dual 3W speakers,120 inch projection screen included,Easy to connect to Wi-Fi for screen mirroring
cons: Brightness not rated as ANSI lumens

product name: Dreame Bot L10 Pro robot vacuum
product description: If you need a two-in-one mopping and sweeping robot with voice control, scheduling and object avoidance then take a look at the Dreame Bot L10 Pro.
pros: Good obstacle avoidance,Easy to connect with app
cons: Mopping function can be patchy

product description: The Bluetti AC200P is a perfect addition to your home or office to keep your appliances and tech devices going when the power goes out.
pros: Five input and 17 output options,Easy-to-use LCD control screen,2000W output
cons: Heavy at 60 pounds,No optional trolley

product description: If you have a laptop that supports Thunderbolt 3, Plugable's Thunderbolt 3 Docking Station is a competent and unobtrusive solution for office- and home-based workers.
Despite its solid CPU, RAM and storage platform, the 2021 MateBook X Pro fails to address its awkward webcam arrangement and delivers less battery life than last year's model.
pros: Stylish and robust chassis ,Great 3:2 screen ,Good CPU, RAM and storage specs ,Comfortable, quiet keyboard
cons: Awkward webcam location ,May struggle to achieve all-day battery life ,Speakers could use more bass

product name: Mophie Powerstation Go Rugged Air Compressor
product description: Mophie is known for its power solutions and this new rugged Powerstation product has all you need for your vehicles, boats, bikes, camping trips, and much more. Power, battery charging, air, and light are all provided by the one handy device that should be ready for any emergency situation.

The Surface Laptop 4 offers performance and battery life in a thin-and-light chassis with a wide range of configurations available. There are trade-offs, but in practice you're unlikely to notice them.
pros: Good performance and excellent portability ,Long battery life ,Gorgeous 3:2 touchscreen display ,Stylish metal and fabric design options
cons: Keyboard action could be firmer,Short on ports ,Moderate SSD performance

product description: Apple's new 24-inch iMac has a striking design and delivers similar (impressive) performance-per-watt to its M1-based siblings. It's a desirable AIO, but the M1 Mac Mini offers better value for money.
pros: Striking, slimline design ,Strong performance from the M1 SoC ,Improved webcam, speakers and microphone ,Bright, colourful 4.5K Retina display
cons: Limited connectivity on base configuration ,Can’t adjust screen height or rotation ,No user upgrades or repairs ,No discrete or external GPU options

product description: AfterShokz is known for its bone conduction technology that leaves your ears open to your surrounding environment. The OpenComm headset incorporates a boom mic for an optimal voice communication experience.
The Ezviz C8C is an easy to connect security camera with manual pan, tilt and digital zoom that will enable you to monitor a wide area, and manage your videos through a well-built app.
pros: Good pan, tilt, and digital zoom,Easy to connect to app,Local SD card or cloud storage
cons: Microphone only - no two-way audio,No siren

product name: Netgear Nighthawk RAXE500 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Router
product description: Netgear adds support for the latest 6GHz Wi-Fi 6E standard to its flagship router, which supports throughput of up to 10.8Gbps and 'fast and reliable' connections for up to 60 devices.

The addition of Intel's latest 11th-generation Core processor improves graphics performance, in particular, while most other aspects of this top-notch Windows 10 ultraportable remain excellent, as before, although battery life could be better.
pros: 11th generation Core i7 processor ,High-resolution (4K+/UHD+) IPS touchscreen,Good CPU and GPU performance,Excellent keyboard ,Slim but solid build
cons: Only two (Thunderbolt 4) ports ,Lid is tricky to open ,No mobile broadband option ,Battery life could be better

product description: The Neabot NoMo Q11 robot vacuum is a futuristic-looking, multi-function sweeping and mopping robot vacuum with an auto-empty station that easily connects to its app, and it will sweep and mop your home efficiently.
pros: Stylish and futuristic look,Auto-empty station,Easy to connect to app
cons: Robot vacuum often cannot find charging dock,App does not have no-mop zones for carpeted areas

product description: The Siri Remote may steal the show with Apple’s latest Apple TV 4K, but the entire setup deserves some praise.
pros: Improved performance,New Siri Remote is a big upgrade,Plenty of streaming apps and service options,Apple services are front and center
cons: Expensive

product description: The flagship single-board computer from the Raspberry Pi Foundation is still going strong.
pros: Small, affordable single-board computer for hobbyists and students ,Plenty of I/O ports ,Wide choice of operating systems
cons: Needs fan and case ,No built-in storage ,Alternate operating systems need higher-spec, more expensive versions

product description: Aira's FreePower technology provides an intelligent Qi coil grid for position-free placement. Volonic uses this technology in its high end Valet 3 product with several customization elements for those looking for something that stands out.
pros: High quality materials, fit, and finish,Set your device down virtually anywhere,Ample custom design options,No fan, quiet operation,Software can be updated for improvements
cons: Very expensive
